name: PokiPack
description:
PokiPack is a pack of .VBS and .BAT files you can use at your disposable. 

This may seem like some nerdy boring garbage, but you can have some fun. Instead of using Windows 10's useful calculator, you can choose one of the few functional calculators PokiPack has instead. PokiPack has a RNG, (Random Number Generator) 

3 calculators, (Division, Multiplication, and Subtraction) a Text-to-speech machine, as well as a Text-to-WindowsError machine, timer, clock, 

 and a cool "Matrix" generation file.
